def main():
    P, Q, R = map(int, input().split())
    print(min(P+Q, Q+R, R+P))

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()

N, X = map(int, input().split())

L = list(map(int, input().split()))

d = 0
for i in range(N):
    d = d + L[i]
    if d > X:
        print(i+1)
        break
